questions.text: In onePOS, which of the following settings must match between the SNBC S80 thermal printer and the Management Console for proper communication?
questions.explanation: The baud rate (e.g., 115200) must match exactly for the printer to function correctly.

questions.text: The 'Add Like' feature in onePOS is only available when creating new menu items.
questions.explanation: It's available in multiple areas such as adding employees, menus, printer routings, and more.

questions.text: Which onePOS feature allows you to set separate cash and credit card prices for the same item?
questions.explanation: Dual pricing allows cash prices to be discounted and credit prices to include processing costs.

questions.text: When setting up a Kitchen Display System (KDS) in onePOS, you must assign it to a specific terminal number.
questions.explanation: Yes—the KDS must be linked to a terminal for routing and communication to work.

questions.text: In onePOS reporting, what is the primary purpose of assigning sales categories to items?
questions.explanation: Sales categories help filter and organize data in reports and track performance by category.

questions.text: If a printer’s COM port setting in Windows Device Manager does not match the port assigned in onePOS, printing will still work as long as the baud rate matches.
questions.explanation: Both the COM port and baud rate must match for proper communication.

questions.text: Which of these actions can be performed from the onePOS Management Console?
options: Changing the paper roll in a terminal
questions.explanation: Timecard adjustments are done in the Management Console; the other actions are hardware-level tasks.

questions.text: In onePOS, a price group can be used to apply alternate pricing during happy hour.
questions.explanation: Price groups allow for alternate pricing schedules such as happy hour or specials.

questions.text: When configuring a thermal printer in onePOS, which 'Params' setting corresponds to 115200 baud, no parity, 8 data bits, and 1 stop bit?
questions.explanation: These parameters define the communication protocol between the printer and terminal.

questions.text: The 'Gift Card Dashboard' in onePOS allows operators to check a customer's gift card balance without logging into the online ordering site.
questions.explanation: The dashboard is a separate tool for viewing gift card information directly.
